exceptions.tactic: apply g_app_inv in Hsc as [L [R [H1 [H2 H3]]]].

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

g_app_inv: forall (k i : nat) P (l r : list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))), g k i P = l ++ r -> exists L R : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = L ++ R /\ l = g k i L /\ r = g k (length l + i) R

subcode : code ?X -> nat * list ?X -> Prop where ?X : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) k : nat i : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) j : nat ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n)) |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) k : nat i : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) j : nat ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n)) |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) k : nat i : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) j : nat ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n)) |- nat]
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P0 : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P0 pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P0 (pos_nxt p0)) -> P0 p where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) ->...-> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) k : nat i : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) j : nat ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n)) |- nat]
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ->> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s -> > se -> Q s

```coq
intros. intros Hsc.
apply g_app_inv in Hsc as [L [R [H1 [H2 H3]]]].
exists (f k j (hd (mm_inc (Fin.L n)) L)).
split.
- apply g_subcode with (P := L) in H1. assumption.
- rewrite H2. rewrite H1. simpl. reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros. intros Hsc. apply g_app_inv in Hsc as [L [R [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. exists (f k j (hd (mm_inc (Fin.L n)) L)). split. - apply g_subcode with (P := L) in H1. auto. - rewrite H2. rewrite H1. simpl. reflexivity.
